item.title: ASP.NET Core: JWT and Refresh Token with HttpOnly Cookies
item.description: I would like to talk about the SPA client authentication. Most of the blog implementations are stores the token into localStorage, sessionStorage or in-memory storage (redux/vuex/ngrx). It depends on your needs. For instance, you don’t need high security with your In-House applications. For other cases, you need to increase your security. Today, I will try to explain that with my best.
